#!/bin/sh
PID_FILE=/home/fs/repos/.xproc/devpi-server/xprocess.PID 
export PID_FILE
. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh
sleep  8585
 devpi-server --start --init --serverdir /home/fs/repos
 devpi-server   --start \
                --port 8000\
                --host 0.0.0.0\
                --serverdir /home/fs/repos\
                --outside-url=_EnginesEnvironment(fqdn)


startup_complete                
sleep 

wait
 devpi-server --stop  --serverdir /home/fs/repos\
shutdown_complete
